languages.text: "Набожные пастыри церкви святого Друза доставили в наши трюмы некоторое количество намоленных и благословленных реликвий".
"The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."
languages.original_text: "Набожные пастыри церкви святого Друза доставили в наши трюмы некоторое количество намоленных и благословленных реликвий".

traits.locale_text: "Fanatic pastors of the Saint Drusus Church supplied our holds with a certain quantity of relics, blessed and imbued with prayers."
"Fanatic pastors of the Saint Drusus Church supplied our holds with a certain quantity of relics, blessed and imbued with prayers."
"Fanatic pastors of the Saint Drusus Church supplied our holds with a certain quantity of blessed and imbued with prayers relics."
"Fanatic pastors of the Saint Drusus Church supplied our holds with a certain quantity of blessed and imbued with prayers relics."
"The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

languages.text: “圣德鲁苏斯教会热忱的牧师为我们提供了许多圣物，这些圣物充满了祈祷的力量。”
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

traits.locale_text: “圣德鲁苏斯教会热忱的牧师为我们提供了许多圣物，这些圣物充满了祈祷的力量。”

languages.text: « Les pieux prêcheurs du culte de Saint Drusus nous ont fourni bon nombre de reliques bénies par leurs saintes prières. »
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

traits.locale_text: « Les pieux prédicateurs du culte de Saint Drusus nous ont fourni bon nombre de reliques bénies par leurs saintes prières. »

languages.text: "Die frommen Prediger des Kults des Heiligen Drusus haben unsere Frachträume mit einigen Relikten ausgestattet, die durch ihre Gebete gesegnet sind."
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

traits.locale_text: "Die frommen Prediger des Kults des Heiligen Drusus haben unsere Frachträume mit einigen Relikten ausgestattet, die durch ihre Gebete gesegnet sind."

languages.text: «Los predicadores fanáticos del Culto de san Drusus nos han entregado algunas reliquias bendecidas e imbuidas con oraciones».
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

traits.locale_text: «Los predicadores fanáticos del Culto de san Drusus nos han entregado algunas reliquias bendecidas e imbuidas con oraciones».

languages.text: 「聖ドルスス教団の敬虔なプリーチャーたちは、彼らの祈りによって祝福された聖遺物を、私たちの館に提供してくれました」
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."

traits.locale_text: 「聖ドルスス教団の敬虔なプリーチャーたちは、彼らの祈りによって祝福された聖遺物を、私たちの館に提供してくれました」

languages.text: "Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın sadık vaizleri, dualarla kutsadıkları birtakım yâdigarları bize bahşettiler."
languages.original_text: "The devout preachers of the Cult of Saint Drusus supplied our holds with a number of relics blessed by their prayers."
